member.name: T:QuandlCS.Types.FileFormats
member.summary:
Specifies the different "file" formats that the requested data from Quandl should be returned in.
More information about file formats can be found at: http://www.quandl.com/help/api#Download

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.FileFormats.CSV
member.summary: Comma Seperated Variables

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.FileFormats.HTML
member.summary: Plain unformatted HTML text

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.FileFormats.JSON
member.summary: Valid JSON document

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.FileFormats.XML
member.summary: Well structured XML document

member.name: T:QuandlCS.Types.Frequencies
member.summary:
Specifies the time series frequency of the data returned through a download request from Quandl.
More information about file formats can be found at: http://www.quandl.com/help/api#Frequency+Collapsing

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Frequencies.None
member.summary: Data returned is the raw data with the highest frequency available

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Frequencies.Daily
member.summary: Data returned corresponds daily values

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Frequencies.Weekly
member.summary: Data returned corresponds weekly values

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Frequencies.Monthly
member.summary: Data returned corresponds monthly values

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Frequencies.Quarterly
member.summary: Data returned corresponds quarterly values

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Frequencies.Annualy
member.summary: Data returned corresponds yearly values

member.name: T:QuandlCS.Types.SortOrders
member.summary:
Specifies the sort order that should be applied to the dates of the data being returned by Quandl.
More information about file formats can be found at: http://www.quandl.com/help/api#Sort+Order

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.SortOrders.Ascending
member.summary: Data returned is in ascending order

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.SortOrders.Descending
member.summary: Data returned is in descending order

member.name: T:QuandlCS.Types.Transformations
member.summary:
Specifies the transformation that Quandl should apply to the data when returning the results of the request.
More information about transformations can be found at: http://www.quandl.com/help/api#Transformations

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Transformations.None
member.summary: Data returned corresponds to the raw data with no transformations applied y'[i] = y[i]

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Transformations.Difference
member.summary: Data returned corresponds to the absolute difference y'[i] = y[i] - y[i-1]

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Transformations.RelativeDifference
member.summary: Data returned corresponds to the relative difference y'[i] = (y[i] - y[i-1])/y[i-1]

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Transformations.Cumulative
member.summary: Data returned corresponds to the cummulative amounts y'[i] = y[i] +y[i-1] + ... + y[0]

member.name: F:QuandlCS.Types.Transformations.Normalize
member.summary: Data returned corresponds to the normalized amounts y'[i] = (y[i]/y[0]) * 100
